agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: County Affairs TIME & DATE: 1:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Tuesday, February 19, 2019 PLACE: JHR 120 CHAIR: Rep. Garnet Coleman Organizational meeting with a special briefing regarding Texas demographic and political trends by Steve Murdock, Ph.D., founding Director of the Hobby Center for the Study of Texas, former Director of the U.S. Census Bureau and former state demographer, Richard Murray, Ph.D., Director of the Survey Research Institute at the University of Houston Center for Public Policy, and James Henson, Ph.D., director of the Texas Politics Project. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
